data.prayer: Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Aomori, Japan, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Aomori, Japan
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Aomori to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.section_summary: On average, 124 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Aomori, Japan.
data.prayer: Lord, reveal yourself to these new families.
Spirit, encourage every one of the 7,775 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.
Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Aomori, Japan from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Burakumin people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Jesus, help the church in the state of Aomori to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.

Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Aomori with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Aomori words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

location.name: Aomori
